tool_description: This is an API to get lists of 36 states and 774 local government areas in Nigeria
name: Nigeria States And LGA
title: Nigeria States And LGA

api_list.name: /lgalists
api_list.description: get the list of all the 774 local govt areas in Nigeria
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nigeria-states-and-lga.p.rapidapi.com/lgalists"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nigeria-states-and-lga.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nigeria-states-and-lga.p.rapidapi.com/lgalists"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nigeria-states-and-lga.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
